panels.description: The metrics about request unit cost for all resource groups.

targets.expr: sum(rate(resource_manager_resource_unit_read_request_unit_sum{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", type=~"|tp"}[1m])) by (resource_group) + sum(rate(resource_manager_resource_unit_write_request_unit_sum{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", type=~"|tp"}[1m])) by (resource_group)

panels.title: RU

panels.description: The max request unit cost for resource groups during in a period(20s).
panels.title: RU Max (Max Cost During 20s Period)

panels.description: The avg request unit cost for each query.

targets.expr: (sum(rate(resource_manager_resource_unit_read_request_unit_sum{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", type=~"|tp"}[1m])) by (name) + sum(rate(resource_manager_resource_unit_write_request_unit_sum{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", type=~"|tp"}[1m])) by (name)) / sum(rate(tidb_session_resource_group_query_total{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster"}[1m])) by (name)

panels.title: RU Per Query

panels.description: The read request unit cost for all resource groups.
panels.title: RRU

panels.description: The avg read request unit cost for each query.
panels.title: RRU Per Query

panels.description: The write request unit cost for all resource groups.
panels.title: WRU

panels.description: The avg write request unit cost for each query.
panels.title: WRU Per Query

panels.description: The metrics about kv request count for all resource groups.
panels.title: KV Request Count

panels.description: The avg kv request count for each query.
panels.title: KV Request Count Per Query

panels.description: The metrics about bytes read for all resource groups.

panels.description: The avg bytes read for each query.
panels.title: Bytes Read Per Query

panels.description: The metrics about bytes written for all resource groups.

panels.title: Bytes Written Per Query

panels.title: KV CPU Time

panels.description: The metrics about sql cpu time for all resource groups.
panels.title: SQL CPU Time

panels.description: The metrics about active resource groups.
panels.title: Active Resource Groups

panels.description: The metrics about total kv request count.

targets.expr: sum(rate(resource_manager_client_request_success_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tidb_instance"}[1m])) by (instance) + sum(rate(resource_manager_client_request_fail{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tidb_instance"}[1m])) by (instance)

sum(rate(resource_manager_client_request_success_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tidb_instance"}[1m])) by (instance, name) + sum(rate(resource_manager_client_request_fail{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tidb_instance"}[1m])) by (instance, name)

panels.title: Total KV Request Count

panels.description: The metrics about failed kv request count.
panels.title: Failed KV Request Count

panels.description: The metrics about successful kv request wait duration.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(resource_manager_client_request_success_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tidb_instance"}[1m])) by (instance, name, le))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(resource_manager_client_request_success_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tidb_instance"}[1m])) by (instance, name, le))

panels.title: Successful KV Request Wait Duration

panels.title: Successful KV Request Count

panels.title: Runaway Event

panels.description: The wait Duration of tasks that triggers quota limiter wait per priority

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(tikv_resource_control_priority_wait_duration_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance, priority, le))

sum(rate(tikv_resource_control_priority_wait_duration_sum{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance, priority) / sum(rate(tikv_resource_control_priority_wait_duration_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance, priority)

panels.title: Priority Task Wait Duration

panels.description: The total background task's request unit cost for all resource groups.
